blocks.title: About
blocks.text:
Hi there,

I am a french interactive developer living in Paris.
I have 8+ years experience in big ad agencies and small design studios in Paris and London.

I mainly work on front end for websites or apps.
I also enjoy to experiment more tangible stuffs.

Feel free to have a look at my projects either experiments or freelance or build at Pirata and Sennep.

You can contact me at nico@nicolaspigelet.com.

blocks.title: Tech stuffs
blocks.text:
As a freelancer, I'm able to get my head around different technologies and production process quite quickly. Using automation tools like npm scrupts or gulp, and different JS libraries (VueJS, React or nothing...).
